extensionDescription.message: Use ChatGPT or Ollama to enhance you emails!

prompt_selection_needed.message: To proceed, you need to select some text!

customPrompts_managePrompts_info_default.message: The default prompts are not editable. You can disable them, then copy the prompt text and paste it into a new one to create a modified version.
You can import and export the prompts. Existing prompts with the same ID will be overwritten. Prompts with new IDs will be added.
If everything is correct, after the import click on the 'Save All' button.

customPrompts_form_label_ID_rules.message: Must be unique, lowercase and without spaces

customPrompts_btnDelete_confirmText.message: Are you sure you want to delete this item?

chatgpt_win_job_completed_select.message: Select the text you want to use and click the button.

chatgpt_textarea_not_found_error.message: It seems that the ChatGPT page is taking too long to load. If it finishes loading, click the button on the right. If the problem persists, please check the service status.

chatgpt_sendbutton_not_found_error.message: Click the send button to submit the prompt.

chatgpt_user_not_logged_in.message: You are not logged in to ChatGPT. Please log in with your credentials, close the ChatGPT window, and then repeat the action you attempted. You will remain logged in afterwards.

chatgpt_win_model_warning.message: You have set the option to use ChatGPT-4, but it seems that it is not loading correctly. Have you chosen the model 4 or 4o at the top?

chatgpt_win_custom_text.message: Insert here the additional text for the prompt.

chatgpt_force_completion_title.message: Click here to display the 'Use last answer' button if ChatGPT has finished its work but the button has not appeared.

msg_prompt_too_long.message: The text you provided is too long. You need to reduce it to use ChatGPT.

prefsInfoDesc_1.message: It could happen that the ChatGPT web interface changes in a way that breaks how the addon works. Check the "Service Status" page linked at the bottom of this page. Also, remember that the first time you use ThunderAI, you need to log in to ChatGPT.

prefsInfoDesc_2.message: To use the ChatGPT API, you need an OpenAI ChatGPT API Key and must choose a model.

prefsInfoDesc_3.message: To use the integration with Ollama, you need to set up a local Ollama server. Once the server is running, enter its address in the designated field within the application. To ensure proper communication between ThunderAI and the Ollama server remember to set OLLAMA_ORIGINS=moz-extension://*.

prefsInfoDesc_4.message: To use this integration, you need to set up a local server compatible with the OpenAI API, like LM Studio. Once the server is running, enter its address in the designated field within the application. To ensure proper communication between ThunderAI and the local server remember to set the CORS settings correctly.

TranslateText.message: Do you want to help translate this addon?

importPrompts_confirmText.message: You are about to import new prompts.

customPrompts_import_completed.message: Custom prompts import completed! You need to click on the 'Save All' button to save your changes.

importPrompts_invalidFile.message: The file you're trying to import is not a valid custom prompts file.

importPrompts_invalidPrompts.message: The file you're trying to import does not contain any valid prompts.

customprompts_form_label_define_response.message: Define the reponse languange in the prompt

ChatGPT_Models_Error_fetching.message: Error trying to fetch ChatGPT models

chatgpt_empty_apikey.message: You've not added an API Key for the ChatGPT API. Please insert one in the options page.

chatgpt_empty_model.message: You've not choosen a model for the ChatGPT API. Please choose one in the options page.

chagpt_api_connecting.message: Attempting to connect to OpenAI ChatGPT using the API key provided

Ollama_Models_Error_fetching.message: Error trying to fetch Ollama models

ollama_empty_host.message: You've not added an Host Address for the Ollama API. Please insert one in the options page.

ollama_empty_model.message: You've not choosen a model for the Ollama API. Please choose one in the options page.

ollama_api_connecting.message: Attempting to connect to the Ollama Local Server using the host

error_connection_interrupted.message: The connection to the server was unexpectedly interrupted

OpenAIComp_Models_Fetch.message: Update OpenAI Compatible API Models list

OpenAIComp_Models_Error_fetching.message: Error trying to fetch OpenAI Compatible API models

OpenAIComp_empty_host.message: You've not added an Host Address for the OpenAI Compatible API. Please insert one in the options page.

OpenAIComp_empty_model.message: You've not choosen a model for the OpenAI Compatible API. Please choose one in the options page.

OpenAIComp_api_connecting.message: Attempting to connect to the OpenAI Compatible API Local Server using the host

prefs_OpenAIComp_ChatName_Info.message: This is the name that will be used in the AI chat.
